formalpara.title: Movie 1. Intercellular Ca2+-wave propagation in the C. elegans intestine.
formalpara.para: Sequential images of the intact intestine in a living animal using the Ca2+-sensitive-fluorescent cameleon system. After Ca2+ spikes at the intestine posterior, a Ca2+ wave propagates from the posterior to the intestine anterior. The movie and its description have been reproduced from Teramoto and Iwasaki (2006) with permission from Elsevier.
